name: Cowquest (oxysofts)
description:
Cowquest

A poignant adventure studying the mysterious origins of our universe and its evolution using multi-layered symbolism and metaphors. Scholars believe this piece of video-game may hold the key to unlocking our understanding of metaphysics!

You must renounce the desire for preconceived notions and bask in the immediacy of improvisation. It is not only a a profoundly comedic affair, but also simultaneously a thought-provoking commentary, a microcosm of society, an harrowing tragedy and a peaceful passing of time.

The unique beauty of absurdity is in its ability to seamlessly blend every emotion in the spectrum, far removed from the dignity of rationality.

Controls
  • WASD / Arrow: Walk
  • Z: Interact / Confirm
  • Mouse: Menuing features (except for one which is keyboard only)
